name: Tetsudou Ou '96: Ikuze Okuman Chouja
overview: The goal of the game is the be the Railway king. To get this the player will have to face 1 or 3 rivals that will try to get that goal earlier than him. The gameplay is the usual japanese board game with some mini games. 9 different characters to choose. With every roll of the dice the player advance through the map of the board but that make his money decrease, he can increase it when he arrives at towns and other special parts or when other character arrives at one of his squares.
